name: Cimpress MCP Dark
description: A dark theme for cimpress mcp apps
css: @-moz-document domain("cimpress.io"){.appShell,body{background-color:#222;background-image:url("data:image/png;base64,");color:#eee}legend{color:#e1e1e1}.content-wrapper,.modal-content,.modal-header{background:#181818}.popover{background-color:#222}.alert{background:#181818!important;color:#eee!important}.card,.panel,.panel-default{background-color:#181818}.card-header{background-color:#181818!important;color:#eee}.list-group-item{background-color:#181818}.form-control{background-color:#5f5f5f;color:#eee}.form-group label,.help-block{color:#dadada}.navbar.navbar-default,.navbar.subtitle,.navbar.subtitle-inverse{background:#181818}.navbar .nav-tabs li a{color:#eee}.navbar .mcp-navbar-userbox a .organization,.navbar .mcp-navbar-userbox a .username{color:#e1e1e1!important}.navbar .nav>li>a:focus,.navbar .nav>li>a:hover{background-color:#2f2f2f}.popover.user-popover{background:#181818}.snackbar{background-color:#222}.table-hover>tbody>tr:hover{background-color:#000}.ReactTable>.rt-table,.table{background-color:unset!important}.ReactTable>.rt-table .rt-thead,.ReactTable>.rt-table thead,.table .rt-thead,.table thead{background-color:#2f2f2f;color:#dadada}#jfContent{background:#fff;min-height:100vh}}@-moz-document domain("developer.cimpress.io"){.PageHeader--head{background:unset;color:unset}.AccessKeyList--item{background:#222}.fluid-card-list .flex-container .card p.description{color:unset}.Panel{background-color:#222}.PageHeader--nav .nav-link.active{border-color:#fff;color:#fff}}@-moz-document domain("mex.cimpress.io"){body.pace-done div#root div div div.appShell{background-color:#222!important;background-image:url("data:image/png;base64,")!important}}@-moz-document domain("pricingmanager.financialflows.cimpress.io"){.css-yctxjt{background-color:#181818;border:1px solid #fff}.css-yctxjt .action-button__title{color:unset}}@-moz-document domain("productmanager.products.cimpress.io"){.product-landing-page{background-color:unset}}@-moz-document domain("pom.at.cimpress.io"){.content,.vue-popover{background-color:#181818}.rwd-table tr:first-child{background-color:#2f2f2f!important;color:#dadada!important}.rwd-table tr:not(:first-child):hover{background-color:#000!important}}
